text: Yamine yara an'yayabhabe ahankara kare beraya amara nidarsanasamuha theke ami tadera abasya'i phiriye rakhaba. Ara tara pratyekati nidarsana dekhale'o tate imana anabe na ebam tara satpatha dekhale'o setake patha bale grahana karabe na, kintu tara bhula patha dekhale setake patha hisebe grahana karabe. Eta e jan'ya ye,tara amadera nidarsanasamuhe nithyaropa kareche ebam se sambad'dhe tara chila gaphela
